API Reference¶

This serves to import plug_ai as a library. In the final version, this should not be necessary. Instead user will need to do a pip install plug_ai in order to be able to import plug_ai. Warning : there seem to be issues when importing monai and thus plug_ai without a gpu.

plug_ai.__main__.main(kwargs)[source]¶
